root: ^While travelling, come across a small cave. You could swear you heard some strange noises too, but they seem to have stopped.
^A frog? But something's off. Frogs ribbit, yes, but they don't SAY "ribbit". Is this thing pretending to be a frog?
^"Come out! I know you're not a frog!"
^"How did you figure out I'm in this bush?"
^"Fair play, I suppose. I'll hop out."
^It does indeed hop out, launching some mushrooms out of the bush right alongside it. It drops a sword it was holding.
^"Whoops. Sorry about jumping out with a sword. Didn't think... how that might look."
^"You want a mushroom too? They make you feel reeeeeeeeeally nice."
^"I think those are poisonous for humans.

b: ^ Having to look for a new host would be troublesome.

root: ^"My name is Rudibert, if that's what you mean."
^"I meant the whole thing about being a huge purple frog."
^This isn't going anywhere. You'll have to do something about this.

s: ^You ready yourself for a moment, then hurl a punch directly at Rudibert!
^Your fingers spark with electricity as you ready a static shock.
^"Your hat doesn't suit you and you smell weird!"
^You swing the rope in your hands a few times, then skillfully fling it around Rudibert!

b: ^ He collapses to the ground, motionless.
^He shakes his head slightly, seemingly taking some damage.

c-1: ^You inch closer to Rudibert, and unleash a devastatic static shock directly on his snout!

b: ^ He collapses to the ground, motionless.
^He flinches back violently, clearly surprised by your devious attack.

c-2: ^A single tear forms below Rudibert's eye.
^He seems genuinely heartbroken. Inconsolable. Beyond any comforting.
^He starts hopping away with tears streaming from his eyes!
^"Rudibert I-", you start, but he just hops away faster.
^Your gut wrenches. What have you done?
c-3: ^He starts to slowly try to untangle himself, but you wrap the rest of the rope around him before he can get free.
^"Okay okay, I give up. Now what?"
^"Now uh. You're going to sit here and uh... I didn't really think things this far. I'll just go."
^"Eh. Sounds fair enough I guess. Could you toss me that mushroom on your way out?"
^Far be it for you to get between a frog and his mushroom-habit.
^You knock the mushroom towards him as you start to leave.
^"Hm. I don't think I can actually eat it with my hands tied. Could you..." His voice fades as you walk away.

FROG_COUNTER_ATTACK: ^His expression shifts to anger, and he seems to be planning something.
^You have no time to predict his actions before he launches his tongue directly at you!
^It hurts worse than some punches you've taken, and you cough up some
